name: Cumulative CO2 by nation - CDIAC (2017)
title: Cumulative CO2 by nation - CDIAC (2017)
description: Data converted from carbon into carbon dioxide (using conversion factor of 3.67). Raw data converted from thousand tonnes to million tonnes. Data for Australia appears to be negative from 1851-1858; for clarity, these figures have been renormalised to zero.

sources.name: Cumulative CO2 by nation - CDIAC (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: Tom Boden and Bob Andres (Oak Ridge National Laboratory); Gregg Marland (Appalachian State University)
sources.additionalInfo: Data converted from carbon into carbon dioxide (using conversion factor of 3.67). Raw data converted from thousand tonnes to million tonnes. Data for Australia appears to be negative from 1851-1858; for clarity, these figures have been renormalised to zero.
